item.title: AMC's The Walking Dead as a free online course
item.description:
Online education… and zombies: AMC turns The Walking Dead into a free online course

Ahead of the new season of its hit TV show The Walking Dead, cable network AMC has partnered with education technology company Instructure and the University of California at Irvine for an online course based on …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
